summary: The further adventures of Hargrove as he and his scheming pals take France by storm during World War 2.
cast: Robert Walker|Keenan Wynn|Jean Porter|Chill Wills|Hugo Haas|William 'Bill' Phillips|Fred Essler|Cameron Mitchell|Ted Lundigan|Dick Hirbe|Arthur Walsh|Maurice Marks|Paul Langton|Jim Davis|John Carlyle|Walter Sande|Theodore Newton|Robert Kent|Matt Willis|Richard Bailey|George Backus|Martha Bamattre|Leonard Bremen|Ralph Brooke|André Charlot|Adrienne D'Ambricourt|George Davis|Helen Eby-Rock|Blake Edwards|Charles H. Faber|Douglas Fowley|Jon Gilbreath|Eddie Hall|William Hall|Joe Haworth|Peter Helmers|Riley Hill|Rune Hultman|Brooks Hunt|Bill Hunter|John James|John Kellogg|George Kitchel|Charles La Torre|Frank Marlowe|Terry Mason|Peter Michael|Harlan Miller|Ben Moselle|Tim Murdock|Charles Murray Jr.|Anne O'Neal|Bob Pepper|Cliff Powell|Walter Rode|Jack Shea|Mel Shubert|Clarence Straight|Tex Taylor|Larry Thompson|George Turner|Henry Vroom|John Wald|Dick Wessel|Crane Whitley|Marek Windheim
title: ¿Qué hay de nuevo, cabo Hargrove?
